concept.title: Open the Shopping Cart sample project

section.title: In Katalon Studio
section.p: To open the Shopping Cart sample project, in Katalon Studio, go to File > New Sample Project > Sample Web UI Tests Project (Shopping Cart).

image.alt: Open Shopping cart sample in Studio

section.p: Alternatively, you can download the Shopping Cart sample project from our GitHub repository: Shopping Cart sample.

section.title: In Katalon Studio - Platform Edition
section.p: On Katalon TestOps, open a project and clone this sample test from our GitHub repository: Shopping Cart sample. See: Upload Test Scripts from a Git Repository.
In Katalon Studio - Platform Edition, open that project by going to File > Open Project.
